text: The Earth Is Thirsty () is a 1930 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Yuli Raizman.«Частная жизнь» Юлия РайзманаЗЕМЛЯ ЖАЖДЕТ It stars Y. Agramov, I. Aksyonov, and Kira Andronikashvili. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1930 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yuli Raizman Category:Movies set in Latvia Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Earth Is Thirsty
